clause_text: The Receiving Party shall not disclose Confidential Information to any third party.
Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of the shared data.
Confidential information must be protected using appropriate technical and organizational measures.
The employee shall not reveal trade secrets post-termination.
Either party may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice.
The Agreement may be terminated upon mutual consent of the parties.
Breach of contract will result in immediate termination without notice.
The contract will be deemed terminated if payments are delayed by 60 days.
The Company agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Client from any liabilities.
Each party shall defend and indemnify the other against claims arising from negligence.
Supplier will indemnify the Buyer against all damages from defective products.
Contractor agrees to indemnify for any third-party claims resulting from services.
This Agreement shall be governed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York.
The laws of California shall govern this contract.
This contract shall be interpreted under English law.
Indian law will apply to all terms stated herein.
Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be resolved through arbitration.
Parties agree to resolve disputes via mediation before litigation.
All conflicts will be submitted to binding arbitration.
Disputes shall be settled in accordance with ICC rules.
The Client shall make the payment within 15 days of receiving the invoice.
Payment must be completed in full within 30 days.
Late payment will incur a 2% interest per month.
Invoices are due upon receipt.
The Company shall deliver the goods within 30 days of the purchase order date.
Client agrees to provide access to necessary systems and staff.
The Consultant will provide weekly updates to the Client.
It is the responsibility of the vendor to ensure timely delivery.
All intellectual property created during the term of this Agreement shall belong to the Company.
Each party retains ownership of pre-existing intellectual property.
IP developed during the contract shall be jointly owned.
The licensee may not sublicense any intellectual property without written consent.
Each party agrees to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
Vendor must adhere to all safety and labor compliance standards.
The service provider must meet GDPR requirements.
All products must comply with FDA regulations.
This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and continue for a period of two years.
The term of this contract is one year with auto-renewal.
The initial term shall last six months.
This agreement shall be valid until December 31, 2025.
